name: Ozone (itch)
description:
A submission to the UT Game Jam 2020 for the theme "Something's Missing"

Explore a world of floating islands and lost ruins. Navigate your way to the portals by probing and sending out vision orbs to reveal invisible objects.

Controls:

WASD: movement

Mouse: look around

Left Click: probe invisible objects

Right Click: shoot vision orb

Credits:

Programming: Robert Guan

Art/Level Design: Karina Teruya

Audio/Writing: Aidan Johnson

Music/Writing: Hannah Chuang

Playtesting/Moral Support: Matthew Zhang

All music/art assets and programming were created during the duration of the jam.
